title: Adventures in the Rifle Brigade
description: WORLD WAR TWO WAS NEVER LIKE THIS Determined to win the war on their own, the Rifle Brigade are Britain's top commando team- skilled, deadly, and with no more grip on reality than absolutely necessary. Gasp in awe as Captain Darcy, "Doubtful" Milk, Sergeant Crumb, Corporal Geezer, Hank the Yank and the Piper give Adolf's jackbooted goons the thrashing they richly deserve...
author: Garth Ennis
